desc: Designer Artisan Crafted Fair Trade solid Sterling Silver and Gold Vermeil Gemstone Jewellery. Stunning, bold, signature collections pairing .925 Sterling Silver with 18K Gold Vermeil and quality gemstones. Fashionable quality designer bracelets, rings, cuffs, earrings, necklaces and pendants. Simple. Beaded. filigree
